trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or other server or user) controls.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle sone kontroller som brukes som beholdere for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> (eller andre server eller bruker) kontroller.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: En sone er en sammensatt kontroll gjengis som en HTML-tabell som inneholder andre kontroller i et angitt område av en webside i webdeler kontroll-sett.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is a zone that inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartZoneBase er en sone som arver fra grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse og inneholder et grunnleggende sett med virkemåter for avledede soner som inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, serverkontroller og brukerkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The combination of WebPartZoneBase zones with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: Kombinasjonen av WebPartZoneBase sikkerhetssoner med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(og andre server) Kontroller danner primære Brukergrensesnittet for et program for webdeler, normal visning av en side som brukerne bruker oftest.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: Alle gir et vanlig sett med UI-elementene for kontrollene de inneholder.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en detaljert beskrivelse av UI-elementer som er felles for alle soner se klassen oversikt Oversiktsemnet for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Sonen WebPartZoneBase inkluderer en hoveddelen som inneholder serverkontroller og en tilknyttet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objektet brukes til gjengivelse inneholder kontroller og deres chrome elementer, for eksempel deres verb kantlinjer og så videre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the features inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, the WebPartZoneBase class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til funksjonene arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse, klassen WebPartZoneBase legger til klientsiden kontrollen dra bestemte verb (for å aktivere vanlige Brukergrensesnittet handlinger som minimere, lukker, sletter og redigere kontroller) og ekstra stilfunksjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartZoneBase er også klassen for å arve fra Hvis du vil utforme en egendefinert sone som ført til databasen.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from WebPartZoneBase, and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are data-bound and display weather information.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel opprette en egendefinert Vær webdeler-sone som arver fra WebPartZoneBase, og er utformet for å inneholde og har oppsettfunksjoner og andre tjenester for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller som er bundet til data og viser informasjon om været.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartZoneBase inneholder flere egenskaper for å arbeide med Stilattributter i en sone.

trans-unit.source: There are several properties for borders, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere egenskaper for kantlinjer, inkludert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: Det er en gruppe med egenskaper for å arbeide med Stilattributter for menyer som kan vises i hodet til en sone, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, og andre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartZoneBase inneholder også et antall medlemmer for håndtering av verb i en sone.

trans-unit.source: These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Disse medlemmene er knyttet til verb som vises på Delkontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: While zone-level verbs can be added to WebPartZoneBase zones, by default they do not have any.
trans-unit.target: Under sone nivå verb kan legges til WebPartZoneBase soner, som standard har de ikke noen.

trans-unit.source: There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well.
trans-unit.target: Det er et sett med standard verb som er angitt med webdeler kontrollen for bruk med Delkontroller, og utviklere kan legge til egendefinert verb også.

trans-unit.source: Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Noen viktige egenskaper for å arbeide med verb som inneholder egenskapene som refererer til noen av standard verb-objekter, slik som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Standard verbene vises i tittellinjen i hver kontroll i en sone på en verb (vises i Brukergrensesnittet som en rullegardinmenyen).

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes også en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>-egenskap som gjør det mulig å fastslå hvilke klikke objekttypen representerer et verb i Brukergrensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event.
trans-unit.target: Andre nøkkelmedlemmer når du jobber med verb inkluderer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>metode, som er en hendelsesbehandling som kan overstyres for egendefinert på grunn av verbet opprettingen, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of members for working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartZoneBase inneholder flere medlemmer for å arbeide med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller innenfor en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>egenskapen refererer til samlingen av alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(og andre server) kontroller i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Flere metoder samsvarer med den standard verb eller handlingene som en bruker kan utføre på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of members in the WebPartZoneBase class that concern how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are laid out or arranged within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes også et antall medlemmer i WebPartZoneBase klasse som sikkerhetsproblem hvordan <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller ordnet eller ordnet i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>egenskapen angir om kontroller kan flyttes blant soner eller endres i en sone av brukere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>egenskapen kan du bestemme om kontroller i en sone er ordnet vannrett eller loddrett.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer might render the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer, kan føre til høyden på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>eller de inneholder kontrollene på en uventet måte, avhengig av retningen på sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se dokumentasjonen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other methods in the WebPartZoneBase class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Andre metoder i klassen WebPartZoneBase oppgi detaljerte programmatisk kontroll over gjengivelse av de ulike delene av en sone.

trans-unit.source: Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Flere av disse metodene overstyre base metodene arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klassen for å tilpasse gjengivelse for soner som inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Important methods include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Viktig metoder inkluderer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer klasse for bruk av en arvet klasse-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, kan bare kalles med en arvet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the layout of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be changed within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om oppsettet for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller kan endres i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The AllowLayoutChange property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AllowLayoutChange aktiveres bare når en sone er i en visningsmodus for siden der oppsettet for kontroller i sonen kan endres, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When AllowLayoutChange is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone.
trans-unit.target: Når AllowLayoutChange er satt til `false` i en gitt sone det finnes flere handlinger at sluttbrukere forhindret utfører på kontroller i sonen: – brukere kan dra kontroller til en annen sone, omorganisere kontroller i sonen eller flytte kontroller i sone.

trans-unit.source: - A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls..
trans-unit.target: -Flere egenskaper som påvirker brukergrensesnittet (UI) av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i sonen er deaktivert, slik at brukere ikke kan redigere disse egenskapene mens kontrollen redigeres ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>Kontroller...</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: – Brukere kan ikke legge til nye kontroller sonen fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: - The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: -Lukk slette minimere og gjenopprette verb vises ikke på kontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: Although the AllowLayoutChange property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Selv om egenskapen AllowLayoutChange påvirker sluttbrukerne mulighet til å endre oppsettet for en sone via Brukergrensesnittet, påvirker ikke muligheten til å endre oppsettet programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: For example, if AllowLayoutChange is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close controls programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Hvis AllowLayoutChange er satt til for eksempel `false`, brukere kan ikke lukke kontroller i sonen, men en utvikler kan fortsatt kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>metode for å lukke kontrollerer programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the layout can be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis oppsettet kan endres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color for the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på kantlinjen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set a default color for zone borders.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>egenskapen overstyres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klassen for å angi en farge som standard for sone kantlinjer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderColor property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen kantlinjefarge for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>kontrollere deklarativt eller programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjen vises bare når sonen er i en siden visningsmodus i som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) funksjoner er synlig, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the border color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som inneholder kantlinjefargen.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hva slags kantlinje som omgir en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border style for zones.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>egenskapen overstyres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klassen for å angi standard kantlinjestil for soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderStyle property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen BorderStyle for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>kontrollere deklarativt eller programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjen vises bare når sonen er i en siden visningsmodus i som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) funksjoner er synlig, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> object that contains the kind of border.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder hva slags kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på kantlinjen som omgir en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border width for zones.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>egenskapen overstyres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klassen for å angi standard kantlinjebredden for soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderWidth property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen BorderWidth for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>kontrollere deklarativt eller programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjen vises bare når sonen er i en siden visningsmodus i som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) funksjoner er synlig, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The width in the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> of the border that surrounds a zone.
trans-unit.target: Bredden i den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> på kantlinjen som omgir en sone.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to close the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å lukke den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The close verb referenced by the CloseVerb property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Lukk verbet refererer til egenskapen CloseVerb vises i verb-menyen for hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, a user can switch the page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Lukker en kontroll fjernes fra samhandling på en side, selv om utviklere oppgi hvis nødvendig brukergrensesnittet (UI), som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>sone som inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>kontroll, en bruker kan bytte siden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>og legge til en tidligere lukket forekomst av en kontroll tilbake til siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to close <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som kan sluttbrukerne lukke <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Closes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Lukker en valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The typical way for an end user to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig måte for sluttbrukeren å lukke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll er ved å klikke Lukk verbet i kontrollens Tittel feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The CloseWebPart method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which carries out the action of closing the control.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall CloseWebPart i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>klassen som utfører handlingen av avslutning av kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: En lukket <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen gjengis ikke på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Det er i stedet lagt til i siden-katalogen, som inneholder en liste over alle lukket kontroller på en side.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` element declared with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en webdeler side som en bruker lukker en kontroll, også har en `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` elementet deklareres med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, og deretter brukeren kan endre siden i katalogen visningsmodus, og Legg lukket kontrollen tilbake til siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a user to be able to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property on the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property on the zone must both be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For en bruker kan ikke lukke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>egenskapen kontrollen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>egenskap i sonen må begge settes til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll med å lukkes.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to create connections between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å opprette koblinger mellom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som oppretter en tilkobling mellom to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of creating a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Starter prosessen med å opprette en tilkobling mellom to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectWebPart method can be called only when the page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).
trans-unit.target: ConnectWebPart-metoden kan bare kalles når siden er i de kobler visningsmodus (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method, which completes the several steps necessary to fully connect two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>metode, som er fullført i flere trinn som er nødvendig for å koble fullstendig to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that initiates the connection with another selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll som starter tilkoblingen med en annen valgte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter settet med underordnede kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden av CreateChildControls overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette settet med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når siden webdeler i utformingsmodus fordi oppsettet vises på siden (og i soner) kan endres i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Settet med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone på samme måte må opprettes for å tillate mulige endringer i rekkefølgen eller forekomsten av kontroller i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that contains all the controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder alle kontrollene i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains references to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> som inneholder referanser til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of style characteristics that apply to a zone control when it is visible.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et sett med stilen som gjelder for en zone-kontroll er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlStyle oppretter et sett med standard Stilattributter som gjelder for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: Attributtene stilen gjelder bare når en side er i en visningsmodus der en sone selve er synlig, for eksempel katalogen, Rediger eller Vis utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verb som er opprettet for en sone som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> child zone.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere kan legge til et behandlingsprogram til denne hendelsen, og koble flere egendefinerte verbene som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>underordnede sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The CreateVerbs event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> stage of page processing, or during postback events.
trans-unit.target: CreateVerbs denne hendelsen oppstår når verb som er opprettet for en sone, som skjer når det <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>fase av siden behandling eller under sende tilbake hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object to change the appearance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer avledet soner erstatte egendefinerte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objekt for å endre utseendet til <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler chrome refererer til de eksterne elementene i brukergrensesnittet (UI) som ramme hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Chrome for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll inkluderer kantlinjen, tittellinjen, og ikonene, titteltekst, og verb menyen som vises i Tittel-feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til chrome er angitt på zone-nivå, og gjelder for alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object affects the entire rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not merely their chrome elements.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objektet påvirker hele gjengivelse av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollerer, ikke bare de chrome-elementene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: To use the CreateWebPartChrome method, you must create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke metoden CreateWebPartChrome, må du opprette en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objekt for å definere utseendet til chrome for webdeler kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and overrides the CreateWebPartChrome method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Du må også opprette en egendefinert sone som arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klasse, og overstyrer metoden CreateWebPartChrome Hvis du vil bytte ut egendefinerte chrome-objektet og bruke den på kontrollene i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> that determines how <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> som bestemmer hvordan <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to delete the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å slette den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The delete verb referenced by the DeleteVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Slett verbet refererer til egenskapen DeleteVerb vises i rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i hver dynamiske <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page).
trans-unit.target: Slett verbet er ikke tilgjengelig på statiske kontroller (Kontroller deklarert i markup av websiden).

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Verbet vises i listen over verb bare når siden er i en visningsmodus som lar deg endre oppsettet for side, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sletter en kontroll permanent fjerner forekomsten av denne kontrollen fra en side.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til en lukket kontroll legges en slettet forekomst av en kontroll aldri til en side.

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, the deleted control instance is not available in it.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker sletter en kontroll og bytter deretter en side i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>sonen inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>kontroll, slettede kontroll-forekomsten er ikke tilgjengelig i den.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan legge til en ny forekomst av en kontroll hvis den er tilgjengelig i katalogen, men den slettede forekomsten er fjernet permanent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to delete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som gjør det mulig for sluttbrukerne mulighet til å slette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Sletter en valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and if `webPart` is static, an exception is thrown because static controls (controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page) cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, og hvis `webPart` er statisk, et unntak fordi statiske kontroller (kontroller som er angitt i koden for en webside) ikke kan slettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the text being used as the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone when the zone itself is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende verdi for teksten som brukes som tittelen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> sone når sonen selve er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property either gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property or, if that value is `null`, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value for the zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisplayTitle henter verdien fra grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>egenskapen eller, hvis denne verdien er `null`, bruker du <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>verdien for sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for a zone.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder tittelteksten for en sone.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er basis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller kan dra i dem til eller fra en sone.

trans-unit.source: The DragDropEnabled property indicates whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone at run time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DragDropEnabled angir om <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller kan dra til eller fra en sone på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The property is used specifically for checking whether the page is in a page display mode that allows drag-and-drop editing, and whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes spesielt for å kontrollere om siden er i en siden visningsmodus som gjør det mulig å dra og slipp-redigering, og om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om kontroller kan dra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color around the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone and its drop-cue regions when a user is dragging a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen rundt kantlinjen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> sone og tilhørende Slett bunke områder når en bruker er dra en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the DragHighlightColor property affects the border color.
trans-unit.target: Når en dratt kontroll holdes over en sone der den kan slettes, Slett bunke områder vises, viser området der kontrollen kan slettes, og det er for disse områder som sonen selve egenskapen DragHighlightColor påvirker kantlinjefargen.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DragHighlightColor kan du angi farge som vises til en bruker når de drar en kontroll i sonen.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DragHighlightColor aktiveres bare når en webside er i en visningsmodus som aktiverer oppsettet for en sone som skal endres, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the highlight color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som inneholder fargen.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The edit verb referenced by the EditVerb property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control enables an end user to switch a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Rediger verbet refererer til egenskapen EditVerb på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>kontroll lar sluttbrukeren å bytte en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i sonen i redigeringsmodus, der du kan tilpasse utseendet, egenskaper, oppsett og innholdet i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Det samme Rediger verbet brukes for alle kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Når en webdeler side skriver inn i Vis redigeringsmodus (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), Rediger verbet blir synlig verb-menyen i hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som gjør det mulig for sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of editing a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Starter prosessen med å redigere en valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen kan redigeres.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control contains no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en melding som vises når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> kontrollen inneholder ingen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The EmptyZoneText property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: EmptyZoneText-egenskapen overstyrer egenskapen base å skille mellom tilfeller der egenskapen ikke er angitt, og de der har blitt satt til en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ikke er angitt og sonen inneholder ingen kontroller når en webdeler side skriver inn i en visningsmodus der sonen er synlig, en standard kultur-spesifikke tekstmelding vises i et tomt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If the EmptyZoneText property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapsverdien EmptyZoneText har er eksplisitt satt til en tom streng, vises ingen tekstmelding i en tom sone.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: En streng med meldingen som vises i en tom sone.

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: En standard kultur-spesifikke streng er angitt av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to export an XML definition file for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å eksportere en XML-definisjonsfilen for hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The export verb referenced by the ExportVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Eksport verbet refererer til egenskapen ExportVerb vises i rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: Verbet vises i verb-menyen i alle siden visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: To enable users to export a definition file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property on a control to something other than its default value, which is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: Aktivere brukere å eksportere en fil for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll, må du også angi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>egenskapen for en kontroll til noe annet enn standardverdien, som er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to export a definition file for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som gjør det mulig for sluttbrukerne mulighet til å eksportere en fil for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, given the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den faktiske eller gjeldende gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> verdien for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>for sonen og gjeldende visningsmodusen for siden webdeler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control for which the zone needs to retrieve the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> setting.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref> kontrollen som sonen trenger å hente gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>innstillingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> verdi som viser hva slags kantlinje som for øyeblikket rammer webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets an initial collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls contained in a zone, based on a template or some storage medium.
trans-unit.target: Henter en opprinnelig samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone, basert på en mal eller noen lagringsmedier.

trans-unit.source: The GetInitialWebParts method gets the initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetInitialWebParts henter den første samlingen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollerer for en sone bare hvis det er en eksisterende mal eller annen form for lagring som bestemmer kontroller er i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden, gjenspeiler ikke endringer personlige data, som betyr at kontroller i samlingen første faktisk flyttet av en bruker i en annen sone.

trans-unit.source: The initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.
trans-unit.target: Første samlingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i sonen er ikke nødvendigvis den samme som finnes i samlingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>for sone, som gjenspeiler faktiske gjeldende samlingen av kontroller i sonen når en side gjengis, tar hensyn endringer personlige data som er gjort.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains the initial set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls that belong in a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> som inneholder det første settet med <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller som hører til i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en sone har et bunntekst.

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasFooter overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi verdien `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sonen har en bunntekstområdet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en sone har et hode.

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls when the page display mode is in normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasHeader overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi verdien `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>Kontroller når siden viser modus er i normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page is in one of the display modes that allow page design, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, then the value of the HasHeader property is `true`, so that the specified zone can display header user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en webdeler side i en av Visningsmodiene som tillater siden utformingen, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, og verdien for egenskapen HasHeader er `true`, slik at den angitte sonen kan vise hodet elementer i brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sonen har en topptekstområdet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when the page is in normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> når siden er i normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object used to access Help content for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objekt for tilgang til innhold i Hjelp for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The HelpVerb property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HelpVerb kan åpnes deklarativt eller programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `<asp:HelpVerb>` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til den deklarativt innenfor en sone ved hjelp av den `<asp:HelpVerb>` elementet til å angi teksten, beskrivelsen, om verbet er aktivert, og andre attributter.

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke nødvendig å deklarere et hjelpeverb for en sone, men fordi den er aktivert som standard.

trans-unit.source: The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> property for individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Det eneste trinnet er nødvendig for å aktivere et hjelpeverb skal vises på verb-menyen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone ved kjøretid er å tilordne en verdi til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>egenskapen for individuell <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables users to access Help content on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som lar brukere får tilgang til innhold i Hjelp på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in a zone are arranged vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontroller i en sone er ordnet vannrett eller loddrett.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutOrientation property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LayoutOrientation gjelder hvordan webdeler Kontroller plasseres i en sone.
