trans-unit.source: With the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> value of each control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>retning kontrollene gjengis i en topp til bunn sortering, i henhold til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>verdien av hver kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>retning kontrollene ordnes side ved side, emne til bredden på sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer can affect the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and the height of the zone that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer kan påvirke høyden på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll, og høyden på sonen som inneholder det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page).
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer gjengir websider i kompatibilitetsmodus (bakoverkompatibel med tidligere versjoner av leseren), eller i standardmodus (henhold tilstedeværelsen av et `DOCTYPE` deklarasjon på denne siden).

trans-unit.source: For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om disse modiene i DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is `<td height="100%">`.
trans-unit.target: Når Internet Explorer gjengir en side i standardmodus, i noen tilfeller den ikke størrelsen cellene i tabeller, selv om en celle HTML-kode er `<td height="100%">`.

trans-unit.source: As a result, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller og inneholdende sone gjengis slik at kontrollene ikke strekkes fullstendig høyden på sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This type of rendering occurs in two cases.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen gjengivelse vises i to tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: - When a zone's LayoutOrientation property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, and you explicitly set the height on the zone.
trans-unit.target: -Når en sone LayoutOrientation er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, og du eksplisitt angi høyden på sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone.
trans-unit.target: For å aktivere kontroller til å fylle fullstendig høyden på sonen må du ikke angi høyden på en vannrette sone.

trans-unit.source: - When a zone's LayoutOrientation property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls).
trans-unit.target: -Når en sone LayoutOrientation er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, og du ikke eksplisitt angir høyden til sonen (eller inneholder kontrollene).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone.
trans-unit.target: Angi høyden til sonen eller vises i en loddrett sone for å aktivere kontroller til å fylle fullstendig høyden på sonen.

trans-unit.source: The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the LayoutOrientation property.
trans-unit.target: Kodeeksempel i dette emnet viser normal bruk av LayoutOrientation-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For et kodeeksempel som demonstrerer høyde-relaterte gjengivelse problemet og hvordan du kan omgå den, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref> value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"> </xref> verdi som bestemmer hvordan ordnes kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The default orientation is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardretning er <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the enumerated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de nummererte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret tilstandsinformasjon for en sone.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState overstyrer base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å laste inn tilstand for verbene og verb-menyen i en sone som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: Tidligere lagret tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The size of the savedState object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på den savedState objektet er ikke lik størrelsen på gjeldende visningsstatus objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the check mark image that appears on a verbs menu next to the selected verb text.
trans-unit.target: Henter Stilattributter som brukes på bildet merket som vises på en verb ved siden av den valgte verbet.

trans-unit.source: The MenuCheckImageStyle property applies only when there is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object in a verbs menu that has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property value set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MenuCheckImageStyle gjelder bare når det er en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>element i en verb meny som har den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>egenskapsverdien satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes contained in the MenuCheckImageStyle property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Stilen attributtene MenuCheckImageStyle-egenskapen gjelder stilen bildets hake ved siden av verbet i menyen.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sonen har sin egen verb-menyen i den Tittel-feltet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects created by developers.
trans-unit.target: Verb-menyen kan inneholde både standard verb som er inkludert i webdeler kontrollsett og egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>objekter som opprettes av utviklere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done.
trans-unit.target: Standard verbene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll verb-menyen, inkludert verb for eksport, slette og åpne en hjelp siden--er én handling verb som utfører de når oppgavene og er ferdig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke nødvendig å merke noensinne disse verb i menyen med en hake fordi ingen av dem. viser en pågående fortsetter tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property on these verbs cannot be set, and the MenuCheckImageStyle property does not apply to them at all.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>kan ikke angi egenskapen på disse verb og egenskapen MenuCheckImageStyle gjelder ikke for dem i det hele tatt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, developers can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan imidlertid opprette en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>kontrollen som kan indikere statusen fortsetter med en hake ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder attributtene stilen for hake bilder i en verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used as a check mark in the verbs menu of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som brukes som en hake verb-menyen i hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a check mark.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer URL-adressen til et bilde som brukes som et merke.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the label of a verbs menu in the title bar of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when a user positions the mouse pointer over the label.
trans-unit.target: Henter style attributter som brukes på etiketten for en verb meny i tittellinjen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollerer når en bruker plasserer pekeren over etiketten.

trans-unit.source: The MenuLabelHoverStyle property affects the style of the entire label for the verbs menu in each Web Parts control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MenuLabelHoverStyle påvirker stilen for hele etiketten for verb-menyen i hver webdeler kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style attributes for the label in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder attributtene stilen for etiketten i en verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the label of the verbs drop-down menu that appears in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter style informasjon for etiketten for rullegardinmenyen verb som vises i tittellinjen i hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The MenuLabelStyle property affects the style of the label on the verbs menu of each Web Parts control in a zone, regardless of whether the label contains an image, text, or both.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MenuLabelStyle påvirker stilen på etiketten på verb-menyen for hver webdeler kontroll i en sone, uansett om etiketten inneholder et bilde, tekst eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information for the label of the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om stilen for etiketten for verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that serves as a label for the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som fungerer som en etikett for rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: If the MenuLabelText property is assigned a value, the label appears alongside an image that represents the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen MenuLabelText er tilordnet en verdi, etiketten vises ved siden av en bildet som representerer rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the property, only the image appears on the menu.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen verdi er tilordnet til egenskapen, vises bare bildet på menyen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the text that appears in the label for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder tekst som vises i etiketten for verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that opens the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som åpnes rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the MenuPopupImageUrl property, a default image that looks like a downward arrow is provided to open the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen verdi er tilordnet til egenskapen MenuPopupImageUrl, et standardbilde som ser ut som en pil nedover er angitt til å åpne rullegardinmenyen verb i tittellinjen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to open the verbs drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer URL-adressen til et bilde som brukes til å åpne rullegardinmenyen verb.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter style attributter for listen rullegardinlisten verb som vises på <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The MenuPopupStyle property enables you to set style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MenuPopupStyle lar deg angi Stilattributter for listen rullegardinlisten verb som vises på hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: While the object itself is read-only, you can still set values for the underlying attributes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi verdier for attributtene for underliggende selve objektet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: You can set style attributes for the entire menu, such as its border color, style, and width; font details; height and width; background color; cell padding and spacing; shadow color (if shadowing is enabled in the user's operating system); and gridlines.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi Stilattributter for hele-menyen, for eksempel den kantlinjefarge, stil og bredde; skriftinnstillingene; høyden og bredden; bakgrunnsfargen. Celleutfylling og avstand; Skyggefarge (Hvis skygging er aktivert i brukerens operativsystem); og rutenettlinjene.

trans-unit.source: The MenuPopupStyle property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MenuPopupStyle gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>egenskapsverdien er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>, som er standard.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a verb in a verbs drop-down menu when an end user positions the mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilinformasjon for utseendet av et verb i en rullegardinmenyen verb når sluttbrukeren plasserer pekeren over verbet.

trans-unit.source: The style information contained in the MenuVerbHoverStyle property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: Stilinformasjonen i egenskapen MenuVerbHoverStyle gjelder for en enkelt verbet i en verb meny når en bruker plasserer en musepekeren over ett av verbene.

trans-unit.source: Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet, kan du angi stilen attributtene for den underliggende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths.
trans-unit.target: Fordi menyen som inneholder verb som er opprettet ved hjelp av Microsoft Internet Explorer popup-objekt, gjengir menyen riktig ikke kantlinjen når du plasserer musepekeren over verb som har forskjellige teksten lengdene.

trans-unit.source: The best workaround for this is to declare a `<MenuVerbHoverStyle>` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size.
trans-unit.target: Beste løsningen til dette er deklarere en `<MenuVerbHoverStyle>` element med en usynlig kantlinje, så menybredde for alle verb er i samme størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The declarative element would occur within a zone, and would look as follows: ``` <asp:WebPartZone ID="WebPartZone1" runat="server"> <MenuVerbHoverStyle BorderStyle="Solid" BorderWidth="1px" BorderColor="White" /> <ZoneTemplate> <asp:Button ID="Button1" runat="server" Text="Button" /> </ZoneTemplate> </asp:WebPartZone> ```
trans-unit.target: Elementet deklarerende forekommer innenfor en sone, og vil se på følgende måte:``` <asp:WebPartZone ID="WebPartZone1" runat="server"> <MenuVerbHoverStyle BorderStyle="Solid" BorderWidth="1px" BorderColor="White" /> <ZoneTemplate> <asp:Button ID="Button1" runat="server" Text="Button" /> </ZoneTemplate> </asp:WebPartZone> ```

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information for a verb when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om stilen for et verb når en bruker plasserer pekeren over verbet.

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a verb in a verbs drop-down menu when the menu is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilinformasjon for utseendet av et verb i en rullegardinmenyen verb når menyen vises.

trans-unit.source: The style information contained in the MenuVerbStyle property applies to each individual verb in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: Stilinformasjonen i egenskapen MenuVerbStyle gjelder for hver enkelt verbet i en verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet, kan du angi stilen attributtene for den underliggende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information for a verb displayed in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om stilen for et verb som vises i en verb-menyen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to minimize <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å minimere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The minimize verb referenced by the MinimizeVerb property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Minimere verbet refererer til egenskapen MinimizeVerb vises i verb-menyen for hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: Verbet vises i alle siden visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Minimere en kontroll skjuler den til en mindre størrelse forlater bare tittellinjen kontrollens synlige og gjør et gjenoppretting verb som vises i tittellinjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to minimize <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som gjør det mulig for sluttbrukerne mulighet til å minimere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Reduserer et valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The MinimizeWebPart method is called when a user clicks the minimize verb on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MinimizeWebPart kalles når en bruker klikker minimere verbet på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property value for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden angir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>verdien for egenskapen for den valgte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A minimized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control collapses within its zone and hides its contents, and only its title bar remains visible.
trans-unit.target: En minimert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen faller innenfor sonen og skjuler innholdet, og bare tittellinjen er synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be minimized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen skal være minimert.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnCreateVerbs method in a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone class to add additional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre OnCreateVerbs-metoden i en avledet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sone klassen for å legge til flere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>objekter i samlingen i standard verb i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å legge til verb samlingen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.OnPreRender%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, and then creates all the verbs in the zone.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender metodekall grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.OnPreRender%2A>metoden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse, og deretter oppretter alle verb i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows page developers to make programmatic changes to the verbs in a zone before the view state is saved and the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at siden utviklere å endre programmatisk verb i en sone før visningsstatusen lagres og siden gjengis.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Updates the status of the current collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone, based on the changes that have occurred since the most recent postback event.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer statusen for gjeldende samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone, basert på endringer som har forekommet siden siste sende tilbake hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet sende tilbake.

trans-unit.source: Renders the zone to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser sonen til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Render method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class to set values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse overstyrer metoden base fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>klassen for å angi verdier for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the zone's content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar i sonen innhold.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer metoden base for å gjengi området brødteksten i en sone som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The RenderBody method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderBody gjengir området brødteksten i en sone, som er den primære innhold mellom topp- og bunntekst områder og inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The RenderBody method overrides the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderBody overstyrer base metoden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klassen for å angi spesialiserte gjengivelse som løser oppsett og stil attributter som gjelder unikt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengir en tabell som inneholder hele innholdet i meldingsteksten, og den angir annen attributtverdier basert på forskjellige betingelser i tabellen, inkludert om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>settes til vannrett eller loddrett, og om siden er i utformingsmodus for visning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the zone's body content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar i sonen brødtekst innhold.

trans-unit.source: Renders user interface (UI) elements to indicate to an end user where a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being dragged can be dropped within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Gjengir elementer i brukergrensesnittet (UI) til å angi til sluttbrukeren der en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen som drar kan slettes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: If a page is in design display mode, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true` (the default), users can change a page's layout by dragging <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within and between zones.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en side i Vis utformingsmodus og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>er satt til `true` (standard), kan brukere endre en side oppsettet ved å dra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i og mellom soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderDropCue method renders UI elements, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property of the zone, that indicate to users where a control that is being dragged can be dropped.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderDropCue gjengir UI-elementene, avhengig av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>for sone, som angir til brukere der en kontroll som drar kan slettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the UI elements that indicate where a control can be dropped.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar UI-elementene som angir hvor en kontroll kan slettes.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the header of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer metoden base for å gjengi hodet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> sone som inneholder <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The RenderHeader method overrides the base method so that it can render a header unique to zones that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderHeader overstyrer metoden basistabellen slik at den kan det føre til en topptekst unik for soner avledes fra de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klasse og inneholde <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> zone, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone does not require verbs in its header.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>sone, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sone krever ikke verb i hodet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: All it requires is a single-celled table, a zone title, and the style attributes applied to the title.
trans-unit.target: Alle SF_NOTIFY_READ_RAW_DATA er en tabell med én celle, et Sonetittel og attributtene stil brukes i tittelen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the content of the header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar innholdet i hodet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to restore <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone to normal size.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objektet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å gjenopprette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone til vanlig størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The restore verb referenced by the RestoreVerb property appears within the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, when a control is minimized.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretting verbet refererer til egenskapen RestoreVerb skal vises i verb-menyen for hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i en sone, når en kontroll er minimert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: Verbet vises på menyen i alle siden visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Restoring a control expands it back to its normal size after the control has been previously minimized.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretting av en kontroll utvider det tilbake til opprinnelig størrelse når kontrollen er blitt minimert tidligere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to restore <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> som gjør det mulig for sluttbrukerne mulighet til å gjenopprette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Restores a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that was minimized to normal state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter et valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll ble minimert normal status.

trans-unit.source: If a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in that zone has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState>, invoking the RestoreWebPart method returns the control to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState> state, which means normal size and appearance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en sone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>er satt til `true`, og en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i den sonen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState>, aktivering av metoden RestoreWebPart returnerer kontrollen til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState>tilstand, som betyr normal størrelse og utseendet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the RestoreWebPart method is invoked when a user clicks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> verb.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis metoden RestoreWebPart aktiveres når en bruker klikker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>verb.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kan bare brukes av avledede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen skal gjenopprettes.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer visningsstatus som oppstod etter at en side ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method invokes the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.SaveViewState%2A> method to render style attributes for the zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState aktiverer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.SaveViewState%2A>metode til å gjengi Stilattributter for sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also saves state information for all the individual verbs and the verbs menu in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Den lagrer også tilstandsinformasjon for alle individuelle verb og verb-menyen i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zone control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer sone kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen visningsstatus er knyttet til sonen, metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter style informasjon for utseendet for en valgt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedPartChromeStyle property allows you to access style characteristics for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone when a Web Parts page is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedPartChromeStyle får du tilgang til stilen for den valgte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll i en sone når en webdeler side er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information for the selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om stilen for den valgte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether title icons are displayed in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tittelen ikonene vises i tittellinjen i hver <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The ShowTitleIcons property has an effect on a zone only if one or more of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone have a value assigned for their respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ShowTitleIcons har en effekt på en sone hvis ett eller flere av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i sonen har en verdi som er tilordnet for de respektive <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: By default, the title icons are displayed in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises tittelen ikonene i sonen.

trans-unit.source: If the ShowTitleIcons property is set to `false`, none of the title icons for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ShowTitleIcons er satt til `false`, ingen av tittel ikonene for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i sonen vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if title icons are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tittelen ikonene vises; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet sende tilbake.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button used for the verbs in the title bar of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken type knapp som brukes for verb i tittellinjen i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The TitleBarVerbButtonType property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>, which results in the standard verbs being rendered directly in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TitleBarVerbButtonType gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>egenskapsverdien er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>, som fører til standard verbene gjengitt direkte i tittellinjen i hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of button on the title bar can be a button, an image, or a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags-knappen på tittellinjen kan være en knapp, et bilde eller en hyperkobling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> that indicates what type of button is used for the verbs in the title bar of a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> som angir hvilken type knapp skal brukes for verb i tittellinjen i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The value for the property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for verbs in the title bar of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter style attributter for verb i tittellinjen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TitleBarVerbStyle property enables you to retrieve a style object with style attributes for the verbs in the title bars of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TitleBarVerbStyle gjør det mulig å hente en stil-objektet med Stilattributter for verb i tittellinjer for alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The property applies only when verbs are actually rendered in the title bar, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen gjelder bare når verb faktisk gjengis i tittellinjen, for eksempel når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>verdien for egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still change the underlying style attributes for the verbs in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre attributtene underliggende stilen for verb i tittellinjen selv om objektet refererer til egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for verbs.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for verb.

trans-unit.source: Begins the process of tracking view-state changes to a zone so that they can be stored in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object, and accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: Prosessen for å spore visningsstatus endringer til en sone, slik at de kan lagres i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objekt, og tilgang til gjennom det <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method invokes the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to track the state of style attributes for the zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TrackViewState aktiverer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å finne tilstanden for Stilattributter for sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It also initiates state tracking for all the individual verbs and style information for the verbs menu in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Starter også tilstand sporing for alle individuelle verb og stil for verb-menyen i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of button associated with the verbs that exist in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone when accessed with an older browser.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken type knappen som er knyttet til verb som finnes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> sone når med en eldre leser.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler verb representere handlinger som brukere kan utføre i brukergrensesnittet (UI) av webdeler siden, for eksempel minimere, lukker eller gjenoppretting kontroller; å legge til kontroller på en side. eller avbryte en handling.

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the VerbButtonType property.
trans-unit.target: Et verb representeres av et klikke-objekt som du kan angi skal vises som en hyperkobling, et bilde eller en knapp ved å bruke egenskapen VerbButtonType i Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The VerbButtonType property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen VerbButtonType gjelder verb som finnes bare på zone-nivå, i motsetning til verb som finnes i hver av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du endrer en side i katalogen eller redigeringsmodus, finner sone nivå verb i bunntekstene sone som bare gjelder for handlinger på nivå i hele sonen.

trans-unit.source: The VerbButtonType property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen VerbButtonType skal brukes når siden webdeler med en eldre leser ("bakoverkompatibel").

trans-unit.source: You must assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone.
trans-unit.target: Du må tilordne en verdi til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen for hver bestemte verb for å få et bilde som skal vises for dette verbet i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's VerbButtonType property defaults to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir URL-adressen til et bilde standard av verb VerbButtonType egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> that determines what kind of button is associated with the verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> som bestemmer hvilken type knappen er knyttet til verb i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object that determines the peripheral rendering for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objektet som bestemmer eksterne gjengivelsen for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> that determines rendering for controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> som bestemmer gjengivelse for kontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of Web Parts controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av webdeler kontroller innenfor en sone.

trans-unit.source: The WebParts property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen webdeler kan inneholde referanser til kontroller som arver direkte fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klasse, og den andre ASP.NET serverkontroller eller egendefinerte kontroller i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler kontrollen angitt dynamisk bryter en kontroll som ikke er en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>kontrollerer ved kjøretid; denne mekanisme kan du bruke alle kontrolltypene ASP.NET som webdeler kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains references to all the Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> som inneholder referanser til alle webdeler kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the verbs should be rendered on <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan verbene skal gjengis på <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartVerbRenderMode property determines whether verbs on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone are rendered in the title bar of the controls, or in a drop-down verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen WebPartVerbRenderMode bestemmer om verb på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller i en sone gjengis i tittellinjen i kontrollene eller i en rullegardinliste verb meny.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the verbs are to be rendered in the title bar, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A> properties to change the appearance of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verbene som skal vises i tittellinjen, kan du også angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A>Egenskaper for å endre utseendet til verbene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"></xref> enumeration value indicating how verbs should be rendered on <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir hvordan verb skal gjengis på <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode"> </xref> verdier.
